001package org.jfree.chart.renderer;
002
003
004import javax.swing.event.EventListenerList;
005import org.jfree.chart.event.RendererChangeListener;
006import org.jfree.chart.internal.Args;
007import java.util.EventListener;
008import java.util.List;
009import java.util.Arrays;
010import org.jfree.chart.event.RendererChangeEvent;
011import java.io.Serializable;
012
013public class AbstractRendererProduct4 implements Serializable, Cloneable {
014        private transient EventListenerList listenerList;
015
016        public void setListenerList(EventListenerList listenerList) {
017                this.listenerList = listenerList;
018        }
019
020        /**
021        * Registers an object to receive notification of changes to the renderer.
022        * @param listener   the listener ( {@code  null}  not permitted).
023        * @see #removeChangeListener(RendererChangeListener)
024        */
025        public void addChangeListener(RendererChangeListener listener) {
026                Args.nullNotPermitted(listener, "listener");
027                this.listenerList.add(RendererChangeListener.class, listener);
028        }
029
030        /**
031        * Deregisters an object so that it no longer receives notification of changes to the renderer.
032        * @param listener   the object ( {@code  null}  not permitted).
033        * @see #addChangeListener(RendererChangeListener)
034        */
035        public void removeChangeListener(RendererChangeListener listener) {
036                Args.nullNotPermitted(listener, "listener");
037                this.listenerList.remove(RendererChangeListener.class, listener);
038        }
039
040        /**
041        * Returns  {@code  true}  if the specified object is registered with the dataset as a listener.  Most applications won't need to call this method, it exists mainly for use by unit testing code.
042        * @param listener   the listener.
043        * @return  A boolean.
044        */
045        public boolean hasListener(EventListener listener) {
046                List<Object> list = Arrays.asList(this.listenerList.getListenerList());
047                return list.contains(listener);
048        }
049
050        /**
051        * Notifies all registered listeners that the renderer has been modified.
052        * @param event   information about the change event.
053        */
054        public void notifyListeners(RendererChangeEvent event) {
055                Object[] ls = this.listenerList.getListenerList();
056                for (int i = ls.length - 2; i >= 0; i -= 2) {
057                        if (ls[i] == RendererChangeListener.class) {
058                                ((RendererChangeListener) ls[i + 1]).rendererChanged(event);
059                        }
060                }
061        }
062
063        public Object clone() throws CloneNotSupportedException {
064                return (AbstractRendererProduct4) super.clone();
065        }
066}
